canBeManuallyDone(AuctionInfoDTO) - Method in class com.onlinephoneauctions.service.AuctionService
 
canBeReviewed - Variable in class com.onlinephoneauctions.dto.AuctionWithBidsDTO
 
canBid(AuctionInfoDTO) - Method in class com.onlinephoneauctions.service.AuctionService
The current user can bid to the auction only if it is not the admin, it is not the auction creator, the auction has not ended and the last bid (the maximum) is not already his/her bid.
changeCard(String, String, String, String, RedirectAttributes) - Method in class com.onlinephoneauctions.controller.AccountController
This mapping is used for letting the user enter new card details.
changePassword(String, String, String, String, RedirectAttributes) - Method in class com.onlinephoneauctions.controller.AccountController
This mapping is used for letting the user choose a new password.
changeUserinfo(String, String, String, String, String, RedirectAttributes) - Method in class com.onlinephoneauctions.controller.AccountController
This mapping is used for letting the user edit his account info.

conn - Static variable in class com.onlinephoneauctions.dbconnect.ConnectionUtil
Connection containing the connection to the database that will be initialized on server start-up in the static initializer block
ConnectionUtil - Class in com.onlinephoneauctions.dbconnect
Class that contains the necessary static methods to retrieve the Connection with the database and make the specific requests.
